item.title: My newest sig, 2pac
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:14, topic:133502”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=184759.msg1678396#msg1678396 date=1187250393]

Not a great sig at all imo,exe stated the most obvious reasons above.

Oh be quiet,I dont follow.Sorry Do you want me to lie and say you sig is good?

No offence, but are you kissing exe’s ass?
Anything he says is bad, you follow. Just because hes a graphic master doesnt mean he is all knowing.
[/quote]This is one of the MAJOR reason I don’t like to C&C.

Exe, I wasnt insulting you. I was insulting frost, whenever you say sumthing is wrong, he follows.[/quote]

I dont know why you think I follow,sorry that I agree…Well so next time you make a signature would you rather I lie and say its good?Please tell me what to do , because I simply cant give C&C the way you want,it seems…Whatever I say your reply will be stop following exe.

Read full topic

item.title: My newest sig, 2pac
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:133502”]What ever you did to 2pac, don’t ever do it again?
It looks like he’s made of clay, and poorly at that. Then there’s these random holes all over the background, which tbh makes no sense. The black on 1 side and Brown on the other doesn’t make a lick of since, and as I’ve said before: This lacks Depth, Flow, a “Light source”.[/quote]

Its from the Until the end of time album cover.

Read full topic

item.title: My newest sig, 2pac
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

What ever you did to 2pac, don’t ever do it again?
It looks like he’s made of clay, and poorly at that. Then there’s these random holes all over the background, which tbh makes no sense. The black on 1 side and Brown on the other doesn’t make a lick of since, and as I’ve said before: This lacks Depth, Flow, a “Light source”.

Read full topic
